The active metabolite of fostamatinib, R406, is an inhibitor of spleen tyrosine kinase (Syk) 2. It binds reversibly to the ATP binding pocket with high affinity (Ki = 30nM), inhibiting the kinase activity with an IC50 of 41nM. (PMID: 33023353)
inhibit SYK activation by decreasing phosphorylation in mice model of TBI (PMID: 33076989)
